source.name: Unearthed Arcana: Psionic Options Revisited
source.author: Wizards of the Coast
source.description: Shine with the power of the mind in this installment of Unearthed Arcana! Today we revisit several psi-themed options that we released in the past few months. Studying your feedback on those options, we've crafted this new collection of subclasses, spells, and feats.
